alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 3:08PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Oglala Lakota and southeastern Fall River Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 308 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Dry Wood Housing to 10 miles south of Angostura Reservoir. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Dry Wood Housing around 325 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Oelrichs, Smithwick and Hay Canyon Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
